properties.entry: SELECT TAG_NAME, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM QUIZ_TAG WHERE TAG_NAME LIKE ? GROUP BY TAG_NAME ORDER BY COUNT DESC

SELECT QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, QUIZ_MODIFY_DATE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, CATEGORY_NAME, QUIZ_EXPLANATION, THUMBNAIL FROM QUIZ JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NUMBER) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NUMBER) WHERE QUIZ_NUMBER = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM QUIZ_LOG WHERE QUIZ_NUMBER = ?
SELECT TAG_NAME FROM QUIZ_TAG WHERE QUIZ_NUMBER = ?
SELECT ROUND(AVG(QUIZ_RATE_RATING), 2) AS AVG FROM QUIZ_RATE GROUP BY QUIZ_NUMBER HAVING QUIZ_NUMBER = ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY QUIZ_NUMBER DESC) AS RNO, QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, THUMBNAIL FROM QUIZ) WHERE RNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10
SELECT * FROM BOOKMARK WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = ? AND QUIZ_NUMBER = ?
DELETE FROM BOOKMARK WHERE MEMBER_NUMBER = ? AND QUIZ_NUMBER = ?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY COUNT(QUIZ_NUMBER) DESC) AS RNO, QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, THUMBNAIL FROM QUIZ_LOG JOIN QUIZ USING(QUIZ_NUMBER) GROUP BY QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, THUMBNAIL) WHERE RNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AVG(QUIZ_RATE_RATING) DESC, COUNT(QUIZ_NUMBER) DESC, QUIZ_TITLE) AS RNO, QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, THUMBNAIL, TRUNC(AVG(QUIZ_RATE_RATING), 2) AS QUIZ_RATE_RATING FROM QUIZ_RATE JOIN QUIZ USING(QUIZ_NUMBER) GROUP BY QUIZ_NUMBER, QUIZ_TITLE, THUMBNAIL) WHERE RNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10
